text: jyare ame tamarathi vacana lidhum ane tamara para turane ubho kari didho (ane kahi didhum) ke amari apeli vastune majabuta pakadi rakho, ane sambhalo! To te'o'e kahyum ame sambhalyu ane avajna kari ane te'ona hrdayomam vacharadano prema thosi devamam avyo, te'ona inkarana karane, te'one kahim do ke tamaru imana tamane khoto adesa api rahyo che, jo tame imanavala hoya
